name: Laxius Force III: The Last Stand
storyline:
The absolutely stunning finale of the trilogy!
Random is finally going to meet the Grand Commendanter! What will be the outcome? Will the Laxius Force or the Order win the war?
Take control of Random, Sarah, Luciana, Coryool, Wendala, Xander, Brussian and many, many more characters, and find out!
summary: The absolutely stunning finale of the trilogy! Random is finally going to meet the Grand Commendanter! What will be the outcome? Will the Laxius Force or the Order win the war?
